sub_title: Programme Manager NGDA Services at LeasePlan
summary:
I am a strategic IT professional with a strong focus on customer experience, marketing and omni-channel environments. 

I have over 20 years experience in delivering and migrating IT solutions within strong customer and marketing focused companies where I enjoy being a team lead and portfolio/program manager for all IT projects within my area of expertise delivering across Europe.
I have centralized Financial, Customer Service, CRM, Marketing and Fulfillment processes and solutions. Amongst many others, I have lead the development, migration, integration and deployment of a customer build marketing solution and a microsoft Dynamics CRM solution used across the Globe.

In my position of Head of Portfolio CRM, Customer Contact Centres (CCC) and Customer Analytics within Thomas Cook I have used my extensive knowledge and experience in Finance, CRM, Contact Centres and Marketing processes to put the customer at the heart of the organisation. Today I have set out the architectural roadmap to centralize the CRM, CCC and Customer Analytic processes and to migrate all markets to this centralized strategic solution.  I enjoy traveling abroad to meet different people and to experience their cultures and build a strong relationship with stakeholders at any level of the organisation to guarantee succesful transformations.

I am a team leader, portfolio manager focused on scope, time-lines and budget. I have extensive experience with designing the architecture roadmaps, defining >5m dollar CRM and CC programs and achieve MT support for implementation across various European markets, I am a requirement negotiator who understands the business needs, the IT landscapes and the  challenges to bring these together. 

I have a proven track record of being a linking pin between the business and IT, to build relationships on any business level easily, to manage projects on scope, time-lines and budget, to coach and develop others and to manage the challenges coming with change.

projects.title: Implement Avaya Aura - Multi Channel Call Centre solution
projects.description:
Replacement of a separate call, email and FAQ solution with a Multi-Channel Call Centre solution enabling blending channels across the agents in the Dutch call centre.

This project includes
- Leading the RFP process to select the solution of choice for the Dutch Call Center (115 agents) by defining the strategic direction, setup the RFP questionnaire, support the tender process and select the preferred partners.
The solutions considered are KPN Storm Cloud, Genesys Pure Engage, Avaya Aura and Interactive Intelligence (today known as Genesys Pure Connect)
- Present the solutions to senior management to support the strategic decision between the preferred solutions.
- Manage the approval process through the project governance
- Contracting the supplier
- Agreeing the Statement of Work
- Project manage the migration from the legacy solutions to the Avaya suite managing the contact centre team, IT implementation, the external Avaya supplier and inform management on progress.
- Handover of the solution into the support organisation
